body.p:
98
Oct. 5th 3
J. Ritter Jr. Esq.
Glasgow. Ky.
Sir,

Your letter to the Governor of Oct. 1st has been referred to this office. The forces to be raised under the State Guard Law -- will be organized strictly in accordance with its express provisions. I herewith send you or Copy -- by which you will learn that no commissions are issued until after organization, and notification of the fact, to this Office Those who enlist in State Guard organizations, are still subject to serve in the U.S. Service -- should a necessity occur for a draft -- which necessity is not anticipated by the military authorities of the state.

Respectfully
Your obt serv't
John Boyle
Adjt. Gen of Ky
